Description: Unique identifier for the weather station.
The date when the data was collected (in ISO 8601 format).
The date for the forecasted data (in ISO 8601 format).
Name of the location or airport where the station is situated.
Name of the weather station.
The city in which the station is located.
The county in which the station is located.
The earliest date from which data is available for the API (ISO 8601 format).
Latitude of the weather station.
Longitude of the weather station.
The geographic region where the station is located.
The state where the station is located.
The timezone of the weather station.
The calculated risk of Tarspot disease (from 0 to 1, where 1 is high risk).
The risk classification for Tarspot disease (e.g., High, Medium, Low).
The calculated risk of GLS disease (from 0 to 1, where 1 is high risk).
The risk classification for GLS disease (e.g., High, Medium, Low).
The calculated risk of Fusarium Ear disease (from 0 to 1, where 1 is high risk).
The risk classification for Fusarium Ear disease (e.g., High, Medium, Low).
The calculated risk of White Mold disease from irrigated areas (30 inches) (from 0 to 1).
The calculated risk of White Mold disease from irrigated areas (15 inches) (from 0 to 1).
The calculated risk of White Mold disease from non-irrigated areas (from 0 to 1).
